definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
permanent member state (of UN Security Council)
Council on Foreign Relations (US policy think tank)

kuai4 ji4 zhun3 ze2 li3 shi4 hui4
Lian2 he2 guo2 An1 quan2 Li3 shi4 hui4

sentences.english: Vedanta defines the real as being permanent and the unreal as being temporary.
sentences.chinese: 韋丹塔界定真正作爲常任理事國和虛幻是暫時的。

sentences.english: This is a unique opportunity to get a progressive politician to be the president of the council.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個令進步政治家成爲理事會主席得大好機會。

sentences.english: The point of goal-setting is to improve the quality of the present.
sentences.chinese: 設定目標的關鍵點是提升你此刻處理事務的質量。

sentences.english: Member of China Korea Japan culture exchange association.
sentences.chinese: 中國名人文化藝術交流中心常務理事。

sentences.english: In addition, there have been concerns over how the council deals with Israel.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有人對人權理事會如何對待以色列表示關切。

sentences.english: In that year, the Council of Nicaea was convened by emperor Constantine.
sentences.chinese: 在那些年裏，康斯坦丁大帝組建了尼西亞理事會。

sentences.english: Once every four years the council subjects each U.N. member to scrutiny.
sentences.chinese: 人權理事會對每個聯合國成員國每四年會評估一次。

sentences.english: Women head investment banking operations at Kotak Mahindra and JPMorgan Chase and the equities division of Icici. Half of the deputy governors at the Reserve Bank of India are women.
sentences.chinese: 印度儲備銀行半數以上的副理事都是由女性擔任。

sentences.english: Cautiously, I walked around to the director’s side of the car.
sentences.chinese: 我小心翼翼地繞着理事長的車邊走動。

sentences.english: Article 99. A board of directors is set up in a stock exchange.
sentences.chinese: 第九十九條證券交易所設理事會。

sentences.english: The Council for Trade in Services shall establish procedures for rectification or modification of Schedules .
sentences.chinese: 服務貿易理事會應爲更正或修改減讓表制定程序。

sentences.english: Mr. Riordan is a Trustee for Life of the International Council of Shopping Centers.
sentences.chinese: 澤爾丹先生是國際購物中心協會的終身理事。

sentences.english: The Star Council official had destroyed it with his laser gun.
sentences.chinese: 那個星際理事會官員用激光槍把它摧毀了。

sentences.english: Article 106 A stock exchange shall have a board of governors.
sentences.chinese: 第一百零六條證券交易所設理事會。

sentences.english: He is a member of Chinese Folk Artists Association and a trustee in Shangxi Branch.
sentences.chinese: 中國民間文藝家協會會員，山西分會理事。

definition: president of a club, committee etc
to occupy a post currently/current (president etc)/incumbent/(coll.) current boyfriend (girlfriend, spouse)
